scripts.pull-drools: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv-flow -p config -- node ./scripts/sync-drools pull
scripts.push-drools: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv-flow -p config -- node ./scripts/sync-drools push
scripts.clean-drools: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv-flow -p config -- node ./scripts/sync-drools clean
